brightnessViewDescription.message: Adjust the brightness by dragging the slider below.

contrastViewDescription.message: Adjust the contrast by dragging the slider below.

dimViewDescription.message: Adjust the dimming level of the websites.

helpViewDarkScrollDescr.message: Let Night Eye turn any scroll dark.

helpViewDefaultModeDescription.message: Choose the default mode to be executed when opening new websites

helpViewOSColorSchemeDescr.message: Sync Night Eye with your active OS Color scheme.

helpViewShortcutDescription.message: Find out how to assign your own shortcut

helpViewUninstallDescription.message: Find Night Eye in the extensions list and click remove

imageViewDescription.description: Night Eye - do not translate Night Eye - this is app name
imageViewDescription.message: Night Eye processes images making them darker. This is feature requires more computational resources and can slow your computer.

labelWebsiteDarkModeListDescr.message: This website is not added in the dark mode list.

refreshButton.description: Refresh current page - this is button

refreshViewDescription.message: You have to refresh the current page in order to apply latest settings

saturationViewDescription.message: Adjust the saturation by dragging the slider below.

settingsBuiltInDarkViewDescrP1.message: Deep integration allows you to control the built-in dark themes of the websites that already implemented a dark UI.

settingsImageViewDescrP1.message: Night Eye converts images such as icons and backgrounds to provide you with smooth and consistent dark mode.

settingsImageViewDescrP2.message: Icons and backgrounds conversion comes with High CPU consumption.

settingsImageViewDescrP3.message: Turn ON for best dark mode experience.

settingsImageViewDescrP4.message: Turn OFF to reduce the CPU consumption.

settingsSubdomainViewDescrP1.message: Night Eye will convert all subdomains of this domain

settingsSubdomainViewDescrP3.message: Turn ON for best dark mode experience.

settingsSubdomainViewDescrP4.message: Turn OFF to reduce the CPU consumption.

settingsTurboCacheViewDescrP1.message: The cache speeds up the website conversion from Normal to Dark Mode (page loading speed is not affected). It can reduce the initial bright flashes, depending on the website.

settingsTurboCacheViewDescrP2.message: The cache feature works on around 80% of the websites, thus if a website is not behaving properly, please turn it off for it!

settingsTurboCacheViewDescrP3.message: Can be applied to specific website or to all you visit.

subdomainViewDescription.message: Night Eye will convert all subdomains of this domain

supportViewInfo1.message: We are here to help if you have any questions or problems with Night Eye.

supportViewInfo2.message: To use our support system, please provide correct contact information.

temperatureViewDescription.message: Adjust the blue light by dragging the slider below.

tooltipDark.message: Using this mode, Night Eye will change colors based on selected settings

tooltipFiltered.message: Using this mode, the website will be by default plus effect of several filters - brightness, contrast, saturation, warm/cold, dim

tooltipNormal.message: Using this mode, the website will be by default, Night Eye will not change any color
